attributes.action: Remove restrictions and rules introduced to mitigate against coronavirus
attributes.background: To apply a sense of proportion to the pandemic. To accept that some people will become seriously ill and some will die but the vast majority will not.  Allow people to get on with their lives without the hindrance of these rules. Allow businesses to operate as normal to prevent loss of livelihoods.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

End lockdown to prevent further economic damage to the UK’s economy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315979

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
